title: StackOverflowError on parsing huge json
body:
I've seen that similar issues have been closed as fixed but I'm getting StackOverflowError when I'm parsing huge json document (zipped size - 1GB, unzipped - 7.2 GB):

```
java.lang.StackOverflowError: null
    at play.extras.iteratees.ArrayCharString.$plus$plus(CharString.scala:143) ~[iteratees-extras_2.11-1.4.0.jar:1.4.0]
    at play.extras.iteratees.JsonParser$$anonfun$play$extras$iteratees$JsonParser$$stringContents$1$1.apply(Json.scala:450) ~[iteratees-extras_2.11-1.4.0.jar:1.4.0]
    at play.extras.iteratees.JsonParser$$anonfun$play$extras$iteratees$JsonParser$$stringContents$1$1.apply(Json.scala:414) ~[iteratees-extras_2.11-1.4.0.jar:1.4.0]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
    at play.api.libs.iteratee.Iteratee$$anonfun$flatMap$1$$anonfun$apply$16.apply(Iteratee.scala:503) ~[play-iteratees_2.11-2.3.6.jar:2.3.6]
```
